title: Killers Amongst Us: (Part 2)  Gorgeous Queens jogger Karina Vetrano murdered the one day dad stays behind.
itunes:title: Killers Amongst Us: (Part 2)  Gorgeous Queens jogger Karina Vetrano murdered the one day dad stays behind.
description:
The father of murdered New York jogger Karina Vetrano says he lives every day seeking justice for his daughter. Today, Phil Vetrano shares with Nancy Grace emotional details of the day of his daughter’s death and how a memorial he creates for her helps him cope.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
